item.title: Comcast Open Source Software
item.excerpt: A redesign and rearchitecture of the Comcast Open Source Software website. New features include increased adherence to corporate brand standards, a virtual conference, and a rearchitecture to take advantage of some of the latest features available through GitHub as a data source.
item.description: A redesign and rearchitecture of the Comcast Open Source Software website. New features include increased adherence to corporate brand standards, a virtual conference, and a rearchitecture to take advantage of some of the latest features available through GitHub as a data source.
